üì¢ **ÊäÄÊúØ‰∫§ÊµÅQQÁæ§**Ôºö**320960100**   ÂÖ•Áæ§Á≠îÊ°àÔºö**‰∫íÂ∏Æ‰∫íÂä©ÂÖ±ÂêåËøõÊ≠•**
üß≠ [ÂÖ•Áæ§‰∫åÁª¥Á†Å](#-contact) (QQ„ÄÅÂæÆ‰ø°)    [ÂÖ•Áæ§ÊåáÂçó (ËÖæËÆØÊñáÊ°£)](https://docs.qq.com/doc/DYXBSUmxOT0xBZ05u)
---BasicSR (**Basic** **S**uper **R**estoration) is an open-source **image and video restoration** toolbox based on PyTorch, such as super-resolution, denoise, deblurring, JPEG artifacts removal, *etc*.
BasicSR (**Basic** **S**uper **R**estoration) ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âü∫‰∫é PyTorch ÁöÑÂºÄÊ∫ê ÂõæÂÉèËßÜÈ¢ëÂ§çÂéüÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÁÆ±, ÊØîÂ¶Ç Ë∂ÖÂàÜËæ®Áéá, ÂéªÂô™, ÂéªÊ®°Á≥ä, Âéª JPEG ÂéãÁº©Âô™Â£∞Á≠â.üö© **New Features/Updates**- ‚úÖ July 26, 2022. Add plot scripts üìä[Plot](scripts/plot).- ‚úÖ May 9, 2022. BasicSR joins [XPixel](http://xpixel.group/).- ‚úÖ Oct 5, 2021. Add **ECBSR training and testing** codes: [ECBSR](https://github.com/xindongzhang/ECBSR). > ACMMM21: Edge-oriented Convolution Block for Real-time Super Resolution on Mobile Devices- ‚úÖ Sep 2, 2021. Add **SwinIR training and testing** codes: [SwinIR](https://github.com/JingyunLiang/SwinIR) by [Jingyun Liang](https://github.com/JingyunLiang). More details are in [HOWTOs.md](docs/HOWTOs.md#how-to-train-swinir-sr)- ‚úÖ Aug 5, 2021. Add NIQE, which produces the same results as MATLAB (both are 5.7296 for tests/data/baboon.png).- ‚úÖ July 31, 2021. Add **bi-directional video super-resolution** codes: [**BasicVSR** and IconVSR](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.02181). > CVPR21: BasicVSR: The Search for Essential Components in Video Super-Resolution and Beyond- **[More](docs/history_updates.md)**---If BasicSR helps your research or work, please help to ‚≠ê this repo or recommend it to your friends. Thanksüòä
Other recommended projects:
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Real-ESRGAN](https://github.com/xinntao/Real-ESRGAN): A practical algorithm for general image restoration
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [GFPGAN](https://github.com/TencentARC/GFPGAN): A practical algorithm for real-world face restoration
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [facexlib](https://github.com/xinntao/facexlib): A collection that provides useful face-relation functions.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [HandyView](https://github.com/xinntao/HandyView): A PyQt5-based image viewer that is handy for view and comparison.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [HandyFigure](https://github.com/xinntao/HandyFigure): Open source of paper figures
([ESRGAN](https://github.com/xinntao/ESRGAN), [EDVR](https://github.com/xinntao/EDVR), [DNI](https://github.com/xinntao/DNI), [SFTGAN](https://github.com/xinntao/SFTGAN))([HandyCrawler](https://github.com/xinntao/HandyCrawler), [HandyWriting](https://github.com/xinntao/HandyWriting))---## ‚ö° HOWTOsWe provide simple pipelines to train/test/inference models for a quick start.These pipelines/commands cannot cover all the cases and more details are in the following sections.| GAN | | | | | || :------------------- | :--------------------------------------------: | :----------------------------------------------------: | :------- | :--------------------------------------------: | :----------------------------------------------------: || StyleGAN2 | [Train](docs/HOWTOs.md#How-to-train-StyleGAN2) | [Inference](docs/HOWTOs.md#How-to-inference-StyleGAN2) | | | || **Face Restoration** | | | | | || DFDNet | - | [Inference](docs/HOWTOs.md#How-to-inference-DFDNet) | | | || **Super Resolution** | | | | | || ESRGAN | *TODO* | *TODO* | SRGAN | *TODO* | *TODO* || EDSR | *TODO* | *TODO* | SRResNet | *TODO* | *TODO* || RCAN | *TODO* | *TODO* | SwinIR | [Train](docs/HOWTOs.md#how-to-train-swinir-sr) | [Inference](docs/HOWTOs.md#how-to-inference-swinir-sr) || EDVR | *TODO* | *TODO* | DUF | - | *TODO* || BasicVSR | *TODO* | *TODO* | TOF | - | *TODO* || **Deblurring** | | | | | || DeblurGANv2 | - | *TODO* | | | || **Denoise** | | | | | || RIDNet | - | *TODO* | CBDNet | - | *TODO* |## ‚ú® **Projects that use BasicSR**- [**Real-ESRGAN**](https://github.com/xinntao/Real-ESRGAN): A practical algorithm for general image restoration- [**GFPGAN**](https://github.com/TencentARC/GFPGAN): A practical algorithm for real-world face restorationIf you use `BasicSR` in your open-source projects, welcome to contact me (by [email](#-contact) or opening an issue/pull request). I will add your projects to the above list üòä## üìú License and AcknowledgementThis project is released under the [Apache 2.0 license](LICENSE.txt).
More details about **license** and **acknowledgement** are in [LICENSE](LICENSE/README.md).## üåè CitationsIf BasicSR helps your research or work, please consider citing BasicSR.
The following is a BibTeX reference. The BibTeX entry requires the `url` LaTeX package.``` latex@misc{wang2020basicsr, author = {Xintao Wang and Ke Yu and Kelvin C.K. Chan and Chao Dong and Chen Change Loy}, title = {{BasicSR}: Open Source Image and Video Restoration Toolbox}, howpublished = {\url{https://github.com/xinntao/BasicSR}}, year = {2018}}```> Xintao Wang, Ke Yu, Kelvin C.K. Chan, Chao Dong and Chen Change Loy. BasicSR: Open Source Image and Video Restoration Toolbox. , 2018.## üìß ContactIf you have any questions, please email `xintao.wang@outlook.com`.
